title: The Turn
description: The world's falling apart.Chris and his companions travel the post-apocalyptic USA seeking answers to questions they don't even know how to ask. Chris can feel the changes coming. It's little things at first. He's flying blind though without Lynn to guide him. Her final directions for how to find her had been sketchy at best. He has a feeling that he doesn't really need to find her though. When she's ready she'll find him. Until then it's up to them to stay alive. Along the way maybe they'll even finding something worth living for.Other Books By RS MerrittCrawlerz - Epic tale of powerfully psychic zombies sweeping the earth ( 7 Book Series)Zombies! - A second honey moon leads to a race across a zombie infested country to save their children ( 7 Book Series)Son of the Keeper - A tale of witches and wizardry set in the modern day world (3 Book Series)The Zournal - Follow the hilarious adventures of Steve ad his band of misfits as they battle their way across the country in search of the source of the apocalypse.
